description.english: Complete the main story in 'Pilgrims of the Wasteland'
description.schinese: 完成“荒原朝圣者”的主线剧情

description.english: Leave Scrapheap in ‘Pilgrims of the Wasteland’
description.schinese: 在“荒原朝圣者”中离开废料堆

description.english: Deliver Narbo’s package to Skornar in ‘Pilgrims of the Wasteland’
description.schinese: 在“荒原朝圣者”中将纳尔波的包裹交给斯科纳。

description.english: Complete all side-stories in 'Pilgrims of the Wasteland'
description.schinese: 完成“荒原朝圣者”的所有支线剧情

description.english: Reach Avernum in 'Pilgrims of the Wasteland'
description.schinese: 在“荒原朝圣者”中到达埃弗纳姆

description.english: Complete 'the Trouble at Fort Larius' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“拉里乌斯要塞的问题”故事线。

description.english: Learn the truth about the Great Machine.
description.schinese: 查明关于巨型机器的真相。

description.english: Complete 'the Golden' Theory storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“黄金理论”故事线。

description.english: Complete 'the Source of Discord' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“噪音的源头”故事线。

description.english: Complete the 'Return of the Wyrms' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“沙虫归来”故事线。

description.english: Gain access to the upper village in Sadirar.
description.schinese: 获得进入萨迪拉上层村庄的资格。

description.english: Complete the 'Insectoid Propagation' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“昆虫繁殖”故事线。

description.english: Listen to the strangest sounds of the wasteland.
description.schinese: 倾听荒原上最奇妙的声音。

description.english: Gain the Spirit Idol.
description.schinese: 获得灵魂塑像。

description.english: Complete the 'To the Four Corners' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“前往四个角落”故事线。

description.english: Listen to Daneram Xevaris announce his intentions at his feast.
description.schinese: 见证丹纳兰·泽瓦里斯在宴席上宣布他的计划。

description.english: Complete all bounty hunting storylines in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中完成所有的悬赏任务。

description.english: Have Velarias, Fort Larius, and the Omphalat Outpost destroyed in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中使幕穴镇、拉里乌斯要塞和翁法拉特哨站全部被摧毁。

description.english: Complete Harvek's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成哈维克的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Renkailon's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成任凯伦的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Criftaa's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成克莉夫塔的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Gor'Goro's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成戈'戈罗的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Finndurarth's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成芬杜拉丝的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Nedir's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成奈迪尔的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Skornar's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成斯科纳的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Eylani's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成艾拉妮的个人故事线。

description.english: Win the game.
description.schinese: 以任意志向通关。

description.english: Win the game through the Wealth Ambition.
description.schinese: 以财富志向通关。

description.english: Win the game through the Renown Ambition.
description.schinese: 以声望志向通关。

description.english: Receive the Wrath of Sergorod during the first three in-game weeks and win the game without ever removing it.
description.schinese: 开始游戏后在三个游戏周内获得“瑟戈戮的狂怒”状态，且不将该状态去除，直到通关游戏。

description.english: Receive the Disdain of Ahskul during the first three in-game weeks and win the game without ever removing it.
description.schinese: 开始游戏后在三个游戏周内获取“阿斯骷的蔑视”状态，且不将该状态去除，直到通关游戏。

description.english: Receive the Treachery of Bal Ur Kaal during the first three in-game weeks and win the game without ever removing it.
description.schinese: 开始游戏后在三个游戏周内获取“芭诬咖的背叛”状态，且不将该状态去除，直到通关游戏。

description.english: Receive the Wrath of Sergorod, Disdain of Ahskul, and Treachery of Bal Ur Kaal during the first three in-game weeks and win the game without ever removing them.
description.schinese: 开始游戏后在三个游戏周内获得“瑟戈戮的狂怒”、“阿斯骷的蔑视”和“芭诬咖的背叛”状态，且不将上述状态去除，直到通关游戏。

description.english: Win the game without ever loading a manual savegame in the playthrough.
description.schinese: 在不读取任何手动存档的条件下通关一局游戏。

description.english: Receive the Wrath of Sergorod, Disdain of Ahskul, and Treachery of Bal Ur Kaal during the first three in-game weeks and then win the game without ever loading a manual savegame in the playthrough.
description.schinese: 开始游戏后在三个游戏周内获取“瑟戈戮的狂怒”、“阿斯骷的蔑视”及“芭诬咖的背叛”状态，且不将上述状态去除或读取任何手动存档，直到通关游戏。

description.english: Die for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次死亡。

description.english: Roll 100 on an Accuracy roll.
description.schinese: 在命中检定中掷出100。

description.english: Fail a Faction Task.
description.schinese: 在派系差事中遭遇失败。

description.english: Successfully flee from a crew combat encounter.
description.schinese: 从队伍遭遇战中成功逃脱。

description.english: Successfully appease the foe during a crew combat encounter.
description.schinese: 在队伍遭遇战中成功安抚敌人。

description.english: Discover all accessible named locations and regions.
description.schinese: 发现所有可到达且有名字的地点及区域。

description.english: Own at least 40 unique Gear.
description.schinese: 拥有至少40件不同的配饰。

description.english: Own at least 45 unique Equipment.
description.schinese: 拥有至少45件不同的器械。

description.english: Own one of each Dragonstone.
description.schinese: 拥有所有种类的龙石。

description.english: Unlock 85 codex entries in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中解锁85篇百科条目。

description.english: Unlock 150 codex entries in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中解锁150篇百科条目。

description.english: Unlock 215 codex entries in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中解锁215篇百科条目。

description.english: Transport 100 Passenger groups to their destinations in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中将100组乘客送至目的地。

description.english: Keep a Passenger for an in-game year.
description.schinese: 让一名乘客在行帮中滞留一年。

description.english: Visit the four great cities within 14 in-game days or less.
description.schinese: 在14个游戏日内访问游戏中的四座大城市。

description.english: From the start of a campaign, reach the Last Oasis in 17 in-game days or less.
description.schinese: 在开始新游戏后的17个游戏日内抵达最后的绿洲。

description.english: Extend an elite hireling's contract twice.
description.schinese: 与一名精英雇员续约两次。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with House Venari.
description.schinese: 与维纳里商团的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with House Darius.
description.schinese: 与达琉斯商团的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with House Oquo.
description.schinese: 与奥库商团的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Ratharnak Alliance.
description.schinese: 与拉萨纳克联盟的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Scythichnis Covenant.
description.schinese: 与瑟斯克尼盟约的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Loaders' Guild.
description.schinese: 与脚夫行会的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Carpenters' Guild.
description.schinese: 与木匠行会的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Church of Sergorod.
description.schinese: 与瑟戈戮教会的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Church of Ahskul.
description.schinese: 与阿斯骷教会的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach the highest standing with the Abolitionists.
description.schinese: 与废奴者的关系达到最高级别。

description.english: Reach a Tier 3 standing with any faction.
description.schinese: 与任意派系的关系达到3级。

description.english: Reach the lowest standing with a faction.
description.schinese: 与任一派系的关系达到最低等级。

description.english: Have Tier 4 standing simultaneously with 8 different factions.
description.schinese: 与8个不同的派系同时达到4名誉等级。

description.english: Have Tier 5 standing simultaneously with 6 different factions.
description.schinese: 与6个不同的派系同时达到5名誉等级。

description.english: Unlock access to the Abolitionist faction's headquarters.
description.schinese: 获准进入废奴者派系的大本营。

description.english: Unlock access to 10 different Abolitionist cells in a single playthrough and report your success to the faction.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中联络10个废奴者支部，并向该派系的领袖汇报成果。

description.english: Complete 50 Tasks.
description.schinese: 完成50个差事。

description.english: Complete 250 Trade Tasks in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中完成250个贸易差事。

description.english: Complete 100 Trade Tasks in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中完成100个贸易差事。

description.english: Complete 250 Mercenary Tasks in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中完成250个佣兵差事。

description.english: Complete 100 Mercenary Tasks in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中完成100个佣兵差事。

description.english: Unlock all Leadership Perks as well as reach the maximum Resourcefulness and Authority in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中解锁所有领袖技能，并将谋略和权威均提升至最大值。

description.english: Start an in-game day with 6 Deputy slots filled.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，在队伍中拥有6位副官。

description.english: Start an in-game day with 8 Companions in your crew.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，队伍中包含8位同伴。

description.english: Reach Prowess 9 with any Companion.
description.schinese: 让任意同伴升至9级。

description.english: Reach Prowess 6 with at least 6 Companions in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中让至少6名同伴升至6级。

description.english: Reach Prowess 9 with at least 6 Companions in a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中让至少6名同伴升至9级。

description.english: Unlock Tier 3 for all four Skills of a Companion during a single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中将一名同伴的四项战斗技能全部升至3级。

description.english: Start an in-game day with at least 250 Combat Strength and no more than 50 armed crew members.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，战斗力至少为250，武装人员数量不高于50。

description.english: Start an in-game day with at least 500 Combat Strength and no more than 50 armed crew members.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，战斗力至少为500，武装人员数量不高于50。

description.english: Start an in-game day with at least 1000 Combat Strength and no more than 50 armed crew members.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，战斗力至少为1000，武装人员数量不高于50。

description.english: Defeat a foe with at least 1000 Combat Strength in a crew combat encounter.
description.schinese: 在队伍遭遇战中击败战斗力至少为1000的敌人。

description.english: Start an in-game day with a total of MP plus MMP higher than 20.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，移动点与急行点之和高于20。

description.english: Start an in-game day with a total of MP plus MMP higher than 28.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，移动点与急行点之和高于28。

description.english: Start an in-game day with at least 3000 Cargo capacity, no more than 50 work crew members and no more than 5 Beasts of Burden.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，货舱容量至少为3000，且劳动人员数量不超过50、驮兽数量不超过5。

description.english: Start an in-game day with at least 3000 Cargo capacity, no more than 50 work crew members and no more than 4 Beasts of Burden.
description.schinese: 在游戏内开始新的一天时，货舱容量至少为3000，且劳动人员数量不超过50、驮兽数量不超过4。

description.english: Avoid the highest tier of road tax.
description.schinese: 避免支付最高等级的道路通行税。

description.english: Gain at least 950 Supplies from a single Hunting camp action.
description.schinese: 在扎营时通过单次狩猎行动获取至少950补给。

description.english: Gain at least 500 Supplies from a single Foraging camp action.
description.schinese: 在扎营时通过单次采集行动获取至少500补给。

description.english: Gain at least 5 Bross from a single Odd Jobs city rest action.
description.schinese: 在城市休息时通过单次打零工行动获取至少5银元。

description.english: Get paid for recent news from a 'Far Away' source of origin.
description.schinese: 交换来自“遥远”地点的近期消息并获得金钱。

description.english: Exchange news 200 times in single playthrough.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中交换消息200次。

description.english: Build your own outpost and develop it to its full potential.
description.schinese: 建造属于你自己的前哨站，并将其发展至最高等级。

description.english: Complete Garrik's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成盖瑞克的个人故事线。

description.english: Complete Vorax's personal storyline.
description.schinese: 完成沃拉克斯的个人故事线。

description.english: Win the game through the Knowledge Ambition.
description.schinese: 以知识志向通关。

displayName.english: And the Sky Full of Stars

description.english: Complete the 'Sealed Beyond' storyline.
description.schinese: 完成“封印之外”故事线。
